data.lyric:
[ti:Memory]

[00:00.00]Memory - Kane Brown/blackbear
[00:00.36]Lyrics by：Kane Brown/Matthew Musto/Andrew Goldstein/Joe Kirkland/Ernest Keith Smith
[00:01.56]Composed by：Kane Brown/Matthew Musto/Andrew Goldstein/Joe Kirkland/Ernest Keith Smith
[00:02.69]blackbear/Kane Brown：
[00:02.77]Yeah yeah yeah-ayy yeah
[00:06.24]Ooh ooh ooh ooh ooh
[00:09.11]Ooh-ooh ooh ooh-ooh ooh-ooh ooh
[00:11.33]Yeah
[00:11.36]Kane Brown/blackbear：
[00:11.45]I wanna live life fast I don't know how to slow down
[00:14.17]I wanna get high I don't know how to come down
[00:17.31]Help me now I'm runnin' on empty
[00:19.83]
[00:20.91]And I don't wanna be a memory
[00:22.66]Kane Brown：
[00:22.99]Am I the only one that's comin' unglued
[00:25.70]Emotions building up they start to run you
[00:28.38]The bottles on the shelf I'm 'bout to run through
[00:31.14]Doin' everything I wish that I can undo ayy
[00:34.22]I'm by myself
[00:36.34]And why won't no one help
[00:39.04]I know this can't be healthy
[00:42.42]So I'm lookin' for a way out
[00:43.78]For a way out
[00:44.79]Kane Brown/blackbear：
[00:45.27]I wanna live life fast I don't know how to slow down
[00:48.02]I wanna get high I don't know how to come down
[00:51.06]Help me now I'm runnin' on empty
[00:53.62]
[00:54.87]And I don't wanna be a memory
[00:56.86]Live life fast I don't know how to slow down
[00:59.32]I wanna get high I don't know how to come down
[01:02.35]Help me now I'm runnin' on empty
[01:05.16]
[01:05.99]And I don't wanna be a memory
[01:08.28]Ooh ooh ooh ooh ooh
[01:11.73]And I don't wanna be a memory
[01:13.99]Ooh ooh ooh ooh ooh
[01:17.26]
[01:17.80]Talk to me blackbear
[01:18.73]blackbear：
[01:18.93]
[01:19.51]Tryna find the beauty in the letdown
[01:21.56]Goin' through my text now
[01:22.80]Tryna find the things I never said to prove a point
[01:25.50]I'ma roll my feelings in a joint
[01:27.76]Pieces of the story that got left out I checked out
[01:30.52]Wish it was I wish it was I wish it was a phase
[01:33.39]Nothin' you could do and there's nothin' you could say
[01:36.17]Runnin' from the runnin' from the runnin' from the pain
[01:38.83]I gotta get away ayy-ayy
[01:40.48]I gotta get away ayy-ayy
[01:41.82]I gotta get away ayy-ayy
[01:43.10]I gotta get away ayy-ayy
[01:44.43]Kane Brown/blackbear：
[01:44.53]I wanna live life fast I don't know how to slow down
[01:47.31]I wanna get high I don't know how to come down
[01:50.38]Help me now I'm runnin' on empty
[01:53.15]
[01:54.14]And I don't wanna be a memory
[01:56.04]Live life fast I don't know how to slow down
[01:58.84]I wanna get high I don't know how to come down
[02:01.66]Help me now I'm runnin' on empty
[02:04.63]

[02:09.72]Ooh ooh ooh ooh ooh

[02:18.77]I'm by myself
[02:20.90]And why won't no one help
[02:23.22]Ooh ooh ooh ooh ooh

[02:26.80]So I'm lookin' for a way out

data.trans:
[ti:Memory]
[ar:Kane Brown/blackbear]
[al:Memory]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯音乐享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:00.36]//
[00:01.56]//
[00:02.69]//
[00:02.77]//
[00:06.24]//
[00:09.11]//
[00:11.33]//
[00:11.36]//
[00:11.45]我想及时行乐 我不知道我该如何放慢脚步
[00:14.17]我想感受刺激 我不知道我该如何冷静下来
[00:17.31]帮帮我吧 此刻我漫无目的地奔跑
[00:19.83]
[00:20.91]我不愿意化作一段回忆
[00:22.66]//
[00:22.99]我就是唯一一个失控的人吗
[00:25.70]情绪不断叠加 向我席卷而来
[00:28.38]我快要填满架子上的回忆罐
[00:31.14]我希望我能够挽回一切
[00:34.22]我是孤身一人
[00:36.34]我不需要帮助
[00:39.04]我知道这毫无益处
[00:42.42]所以我在寻找出路
[00:43.78]寻找出路
[00:44.79]//
[00:45.27]我想及时行乐 我不知道我该如何放慢脚步
[00:48.02]我想感受刺激 我不知道我该如何冷静下来
[00:51.06]帮帮我吧 此刻我漫无目的地奔跑
[00:53.62]
[00:54.87]我不愿意化作一段回忆

[01:11.73]我不愿意化作一段回忆
[01:13.99]//
[01:17.26]
[01:17.80]到你上场 blackbear
[01:18.73]//
[01:18.93]
[01:19.51]试着从绝望中寻找希望
[01:21.56]现在翻看我的短信
[01:22.80]试着寻觅未曾宣之于口的话 只为证明我的观点
[01:25.50]我的情绪会在点燃的香烟中一一挥散
[01:27.76]曾经被遗漏的故事碎片 我会将它一一拼凑起来
[01:30.52]我希望这阶段是暂时的
[01:33.39]而你无能为力 你也无话可说
[01:36.17]极速逃离极速逃离 从痛苦中抽离出来
[01:38.83]我得挣脱束缚  
[01:40.48]我得挣脱束缚
